content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I appreciate your interest in my apartment. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I want to start with a price of 800 Euros per month. For this price the apartment is all yours. What do you say?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I say, 900 euros would be even better. I am sure you understand that I want to get the best price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. But 800 Euros is already a good price for this apartment. The location is perfect and the apartment is in excellent condition. How about we meet in the middle at 850 Euros?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Sorry, but the middle is 875 euros. I am willing to be reasonable, but I am sure you understand that I want to get a fair price for my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 850 Euros is the best I can offer. The apartment is in high demand and I could easily rent it out for more. I am willing to give it to you at 850 Euros. I believe this is a fair price for both parties.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I believe 850 euros is too low and does not reflect the true value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Alright, how about 860 euros? I think this is a fair price for both of us. 

[customresponse]
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 875 euros. This price seems fair to me for a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I apologize, but 875 euros is not acceptable. The most I can offer is 860 euros. This price is fair for both of us.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
[customresponse]
 I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 860 euros is too low and does not reflect the true value of my property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
